data.text: @TiffiePop85 Thanks for being a loyal fan!!

@jewelry I'm not sure who* you actually are behind the account but if you actually see Misty give her a hug for me! LOVE Her!! I always send her Personalized style pics LOL. Misty and Nicki cause my bank to contact me about my purchases LOL
@TiffiePop85 You're welcome and that is another awesome idea! The rib ring! <3

@jewelry Oh Yeah!!! THANK YOU!! I purchased 3 more items this week, got my Michael O'Connor ring yesterday! Misty has a chicken wing ring, and I think I am going to start the rib/ pork chop ring LOL. Waiting on 2 more packages haha.
@TiffiePop85 Great idea! We have put in your request but in the meantime you may love these! https://t.co/6em3M6PajV
